name: avocado-type-checker
description: A javascript type checker. Also a tasty fruit with megafauna dispersal syndrome, leading to an evolutionary anachronism.
author: Walter Rafelsberger

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n avocado -o build/avocado.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/avocado.js -c -m -o build/avocado.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/avocado.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/avocado.js build/avocado.min.js
